definition: to blame/to reprove/to reprimand/to expel/to oust/to reconnoiter/(of territory) to expand/saline marsh

sentences.english: Molecules repel each other when they collide .
sentences.chinese: 当分子相碰撞时彼此互斥。

sentences.english: Any access to a collection of events is guarded by a mutual exclusion object.
sentences.chinese: 任何对一组事件的访问都由一个互斥对象来保护。

sentences.english: However, if the mutex is locked this call won't block.
sentences.chinese: 然而，如果互斥对象已锁定，这个调用也不会阻塞。

sentences.english: Also note that both condition variables use the same mutex.
sentences.chinese: 还要注意，两个条件变量使用相同的互斥锁。

sentences.english: The mutex kind can be set in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 可以以两种方式设置互斥的类型。

sentences.english: Mutexes are system-wide objects which multiple processes can see.
sentences.chinese: 互斥是系统范围内对象，可以由多个进程使用。

sentences.english: However, a mutex should accompany each condition variable.
sentences.chinese: 不过，每个条件变量都应该伴有一个互斥。

sentences.english: The mutex is simple, but there are some rules you should remember.
sentences.chinese: 互斥锁很简单，但是有一些规则必须牢记。

sentences.english: The enhanced commands do not require an exclusive lock like previous methods.
sentences.chinese: 增强的命令不需要像以前的方法一样使用互斥型锁。

sentences.english: But you can also create a mutex dynamically.
sentences.chinese: 但是还可以动态地创建互斥对象。

sentences.english: To produce predictable code, you'll want to use mutexes.
sentences.chinese: 要产生可预测的代码，应使用互斥对象。

sentences.english: A mutex in the thread-specific cache is acquired from the global lock cache.
sentences.chinese: 线程专用缓存中的互斥锁从全局锁缓存中获得。

sentences.english: As for romantic love, it was an almost mutually exclusive category of human experience.
sentences.chinese: 至于浪漫爱情，这是一个几乎互斥的人类经验范畴。

sentences.english: Thus no mutexes are held by the signal while a slot is executing.
sentences.chinese: 因此，当插槽执行时，信号并没有持有互斥体。

sentences.english: When the metals are magnetized, they become so powerful that their ability to repel one another can actually allow them to lift heavy objects off the ground.
sentences.chinese: 当金属被磁化，它们互斥力可以从地面举起重物。
